channel.title: My Question, My Answer
channel.description: OK, I've read too many topics with 'admin or mod pl0x' or something similiar to that. Why don't you just put 'Don't ask to be admin/mod or you will be ip banned, permanantly. (That Includes Posting It In This Topic)' Or..something like that..If you want beggers 'gone' then, make it very strict that they Can't, then they Won't.

item.title: My Question, My Answer
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

On a BETA Server?

item.title: My Question, My Answer
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

[quote=“Number, post:1, topic:21252”]OK, I’ve read too many topics with ‘admin or mod pl0x’ or something similiar to that.
Why don’t you just put ‘Don’t ask to be admin/mod or you will be ip banned, permanantly. (That Includes Posting It In This Topic)’
Or…something like that…If you want beggers ‘gone’ then, make it very strict that they Can’t, then they Won’t.[/quote]

its annoying… but soem noobs that have never had the experience of being a admin dont know… so i think that its pretty fair to let them ask and see if someone nice will make them mod/admin even on a beta server.

Read full topic
